channel.title: Classifier on Underground Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Classifier on Underground Notes

item.title: How To Visually Evaluate Image Classifier Using StyleGAN2
item.description: In this article, we’ll be evaluating an image classifier by exploring StyleGAN2 latent space. We’ll look at the performance of a hairstyle classifier that we use in Ready Player Me. StyleGAN2 is a generative model architecture demonstrating state-of-the-art image generation. Code of the model and pre-trained weights can be found, for example, in this repo, alongside generated examples across various domains. Figure 1: Examples generated with StyleGAN2 First, what are we going to do?
